title: Why does the new red light cameras in wilmington flash when there is no one coming thru the intersections , i have seen this happen numerous times and my wife has also. Are they take pictures when the light is yellow , and saying it was red . How honest and accurate is the program that monitors these cameras. Also at what point do you get a red light ticket ,when you cross the white line after the light is red , or when you cross the white line after it turns yellow.
